text: Alan John Williams (14 October 1930 â€“ 21 December 2014) was a British Labour Party politician. He was the Member of Parliament (MP) for Swansea West from 1964 to 2010. Williams was born in Caerphilly. He died in London at the age of 84 from a stroke on 21 December 2014. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Alumni of the University of Oxford Category:Labour Party (UK) MPs Category:Politicians from Glamorgan
title: Alan Williams
